    • 17 Apr 2013

    Bravado Magazine

    I redesigned Bravado Magazine for Evan Goodfellow and his staff. The design of the website involved concept development, paper-prototyping, development of HTML, CSS, jQuery, and PHP. The final site was converted into a WordPress theme for easy publishing to the web. This website pushes the boundary between image and text on the Internet. Unfortunately, it doesn’t do the best job reaching our South Korea audience enslaved to Internet Explorer.

    Checkout Bravado Magazine.
